name: Applications of Alphafold (Research Scientist)

outline.title: AlphaFold: Revolutionizing Structural Biology
outline.description: This slide introduces the presentation topic and briefly highlights AlphaFold's impact on structural biology.

outline.title: Understanding AlphaFold's Architecture
outline.description: This slide provides a high-level overview of AlphaFold's neural network architecture, focusing on the key components and their roles in protein structure prediction.

outline.title: Applications in Drug Discovery
outline.description: This slide details how AlphaFold is being utilized to accelerate drug discovery by enabling better target identification and improved lead compound design.

outline.title: Beyond Drug Discovery: Expanding Applications
outline.description: This slide explores additional applications of AlphaFold, such as in understanding protein function, guiding synthetic biology, and advancing protein engineering.

outline.title: Conclusion & Future Directions
outline.description: This slide summarizes the key takeaways from the presentation and briefly discusses potential future developments and challenges in the application of AlphaFold.

1.title: AlphaFold: A Deep Dive into its Architecture
bullet_points: Leverages Joint-Embedding Predictive Architectures (JEPAs): AlphaFold utilizes a novel approach, focusing on learning manipulable representations of the world.
Employs Isotropic Gaussian Regularization (SIGReg):  This key component constrains embeddings to follow an ideal distribution, minimizing prediction risk and promoting stability.
Achieves Scalability and Efficiency:  The LeJEPA framework, an instantiation of JEPAs, offers linear time and memory complexity, making it highly scalable across various models and domains.
Demonstrates Strong Empirical Validation:  LeJEPA consistently outperforms state-of-the-art methods across diverse datasets and architectures, as seen with ImageNet-1k and Galaxy10.
1.speaker_notes: Let's explore the architecture behind AlphaFold's groundbreaking success. At its core, AlphaFold utilizes Joint-Embedding Predictive Architectures, or JEPAs. Think of this as a way for the model to learn how the world works by predicting how things will behave. A crucial innovation is the incorporation of Isotropic Gaussian Regularization, or SIGReg. This acts like a guiding principle, forcing the model's internal representations to follow a specific, ideal distribution. This leads to remarkably stable training, even with very large models. The LeJEPA framework, a practical implementation of JEPAs, is incredibly efficient, scaling effectively across different models and datasets.  Finally, extensive testing proves LeJEPA's superiority, consistently outperforming existing methods, as demonstrated by its performance on benchmarks like ImageNet-1k and Galaxy10.
